articles.description: Pakistan cricketer Wahab Riaz shared a video of himself selling 'Chana' to locals in a roadside shop. The clip immediately went viral on social media and won the hearts of cricket fans.
articles.content:
• Pakistan cricketer Wahab Riaz was spotted selling 'Chana' on the street
  • Riaz has not played for Pakistan since 2020

articles.description: The fifth and final Test match will be the first men's Ashes fixture at the Bellerive Oval in Hobart
